rotate_handle_for_use.description: Rotate the bucket handle upward for use.

rotate_handle_for_storage.description: Rotate the bucket handle downward for storage.

statusComplete.description: No action required, the handle status is not applicable.

rotate_handle.description: Rotate the bucket handle for use or storage.

clean_handle.description: Clean the bucket handle to maintain hygiene.

rotate_handle_up.description: Rotate the bucket handle upwards for use.

rotate_handle_down.description: Rotate the bucket handle downwards for storage.

lift_bucket_by_handle.description: Lift the bucket up using the handle.

put_down_bucket_by_handle.description: Put the bucket down using the handle.

lift_bucket_by_body.description: Lift the bucket up by gripping the body.

put_down_bucket_by_body.description: Put the bucket down by releasing the grip around the body.

statusComplete.description: No action required, the bucket body status is not applicable.

pick_bucket_by_handle.description: Pick the bucket up by lifting the handle.

place_bucket_by_handle.description: Put the bucket down by lowering the handle.

clean_bucket_body.description: Clean the bucket body to maintain cleanliness.

pick_bucket.description: Pick the bucket up by gripping around the body.

pick_up_bucket.description: Pick up the bucket by gripping the rigid body.

place_down_bucket.description: Place down the bucket gently onto a flat surface.

clean_inside_of_bucket.description: Clean inside of the bucket to maintain hygiene.

clean_outside_of_bucket.description: Clean outside of the bucket to maintain hygiene.

clean_handle_after_use.description: Clean the handle of bucket after use to maintain hygiene.

move_bucket.description: Pick up the bucket from the handle, move and place it down gently.

maintain_bucket.description: Clean the entire bucket including handle and exterior, interior of the bucket body.

clean_bucket_with_handle.description: Clean both the bucket body and handle to maintain cleanliness.

pick_and_place_bucket.description: Pick up the bucket by the handle and then place it down.

clean_whole_bucket.description: Clean the entire bucket including handle and body.

clean_whole_bucket_topdown.description: Clean the entire bucket starting from handle to body.

clean_whole_bucket_bottomup.description: Clean the entire bucket starting from body to handle.
